Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel for rest”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed elderly parents beautifully positioned arc de triomphe trocadero public areas pretty oh avoid room unless nature en suite wall glass thru watch street outside neighbours across street best thing room mattress bedding holes blanket single bed lights bed wardrobe looked like door wouldnt stay shut still dont know find hotel information kind room parents room building site made anything stay short towels one bath towel two housekeeping simply added another hand towel asked another telephone room basin plug supposed 3 hotel leaving everything landing left questions attention detail management well someone later discovered probably manager tho didnt staff tell say would choice stay paris matter well placed shame

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Value for Money, But Probably Not for Tourists”
Reviews.Author: Trotamundos09
Reviews.Content: traveled great deal throughout europe far worst possible place stay rooms cramped dirty beds bed bugs staff incredibly rude unpleasant every opportunity spent little time possible place upon check manager rude try charge us alcohol minibar dont even drink unhelpful information city perhaps entire staff french parisian middle rude dirty rude filthy say rude

Reviews.Title: “Avoid if your executive status...Please...No Platinum Marriot Perks”
Reviews.Author: EllyDeyhle
Reviews.Content: bad shabby room bad shower old towels checked 2 additional rooms old smelly carpet needs upgrade tiny elevator suitcase fit pay first night couldnt sleep took another hotel good location unless place better stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, OK for business”
Reviews.Author: OsborneWork
Reviews.Content: sadly hotel live expectation location good decor quaint room tiny unclean staff rude one member reception staff describe french kept trying sell us excursions whilst trying collect taxi became quite rude surly several polite offers even return 1am one night stop trying us trips despite paris several occasions stating plans hotel room cramped dirty jacuzzi rather water towels stained place generally unclean woken cleaners etc hotel corridors early hours morning pleasant stay would recommend place anyone

Reviews.Title: “It's nice......”
Reviews.Author: moijolitravel
Reviews.Content: hotel kleber incredibly convenient famous frankly magic trees lit night shame back room room first dont fooled grand description words executive jacuzzi listed website tub jets attached would hardly call jacuzzi sense forget bringing romantic bath two unless dont mind going one time bathtub room appealing jets obviously staff never put see photos even though another completely odd feature bathroom complete lacking shower curtain rail showering water onto floor space really set wet room werent careful could break shower water really wouldnt happened bathroom small would cold wash basin way small room lets say ordered pizza would climb bed door pizza person would room like upon entry door opened directly onto bed like one bit kept wanting turn bed 90 degrees counter give space would noisy hallways could hear folks staying conference getting ready meetings 530 high loud thought left door open could shut still bed balcony ok well big window space outside led view claustrophobic inner courtyard could described tube like effect particularly useful checking weather could look see sized sky day useful positives internet access think could never discover information room guide area features hotel biggest biggest plus proximity champs price think could better though staff nice enough stand caring interested fact chose anybody else matter fact worked much friendlier pay price smile safe neighborhood close tourist spots room hustle bustle also within walking distance eiffel tower photo took view streets two blocks away five minute walk famous landmark honeymoon stay quite disappointed stayed every type hotel resort bb hostel think know little facility offer penny place slightly something really would perfect business traveler traveler two day anymore two days recommended would stay saw personally chose room checking hadnt time explore options btw skip overpriced breakfast get much better corner

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and very friendly staff !”
Reviews.Author: Yaka D
Reviews.Content: delightful 16th location close trains walkable great paris sites staff courteous helpful made restaurant reservations printed maps us making visit hotel small charming kingsized bed tiny sitting area lovely bathroom usually get paris price make reservations early may find internet bargain make reservations web site directly hotel directly hotel arrival given small size best sure expecting remember lock room key doesnt lock well stay

Reviews.Title: “Ask for Jesus Fernandez at the front desk-He is the best!”
Reviews.Author: lmganfield
Reviews.Content: husband recently stayed kleber hotel 1st wedding anniversary slightly worried couple bad reviews read since booking holiday generally happy choice location fab – really good walking distance tourist things hotel quaint room ok read jacuzzi baths rooms none available us instead given room don’t fooled it’s fancy title it’s shower 3 weak pressure also wait ages hot water come system frustrating also problem safe friendly reception quick help resolved issue promptly staff friendly except one man particularly unhelpful asked advice good restaurant assumed wanted stick champs elysees area told us restaurants would full without reservation decided ignore unhelpful advice found 2 good restaurants 2 evenings without booking rue de excellent restaurant offering wide range cuisine really good service cafes around louvre area also good worth dining evening meal overall kleber hotel good value money central location

Reviews.Title: “Not up to Marriott Standards”
Reviews.Author: ip241au
Reviews.Content: booked hotel february via internet confirmation writing exactly expect also chose specifically proximity champs elysee running paris marathon sunday 9th april also running special winter offer price room jacuzzi ideal relaxing marathon checked friday night 7th april given key room jacuzzi asked reception problem man unhelpful seemed find funny hadnt got asked told us see hotel manager next morning also said could use suite extra per night refused next day manager told go back afternoon would sorted arrived back told room jacuzzi us sister hotel suitcases 15 min walk hotel checked got phone call manager say couldnt stay room unless paid extra per night refused said needed go would sort got back returned 6pm saturday time manager still refused give us room unless extra money meantime said booked us another hotel wasnt convenient us 2 tube stops away marathon start refused said would camp reception unless sorted something us moment happened police car outside asked us step outside speak refused spoke conversation asked explain french happened took passports meantime really said wouldnt got back end taxi hotel opera district basic obviously lot cheaper kleber hotel booked originally clean comfortable ideal marathon weekend made complaints writing hotels paris tourist board returning home found hotel kleber bank account idea writing account taking matter recommend stay hotel anyone bad management lack customer service skills experienced hotel visited world

Reviews.Title: “Spacious rooms, area is OK”
Reviews.Author: insulaner1984
Reviews.Content: stayed december 2005 hotel kleber paris really enjoyed stay one two favourite place paris splendid small charming hotel nice location champs eiffel tower within walking distance therefore location cant beat first trip paris staff friendly speaks english well lobby staff sweet quite helpful booking taxis recommending places eat housekeeper best room spotless clean every evening returned hotel exceptionally clean always fresh towels clean sheets clean bathroom amazing bed comfortable lots hot water shower rack towels nice touch used computer basement several times internet access room large jacuzzi great looking nice luxury clean ideally located hotel paris reasonable price check whole hotel tastefully decorated highly recommended particularly price said ill definitely stay cant imagine better location nicer staff

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel--reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: uswmnj
Reviews.Content: good hotel rest good situation business trip nice breakfast good service big comfortable rooms

Reviews.Title: “Alright, not Great”
Reviews.Author: Drroady
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend early july lived madrid know city well know hotel nowhere near main sights far public transit avenida de terminal metro buses buses front desk staff spoke english even though spoke spanish rooms fine though huge nice modern furniture strong ac essential summer madrid views speak besides apartments across street free minibar soft drinks water came handy could go lounge free wifi even breakfast order rate got seemed normal rate would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent For A 4 Star”
Reviews.Author: Gaurav M
Reviews.Content: choose hotel last minute marriot status able book great rate night driving france making one night stop madrid london mistake americans decided new ac collection marriot would standards begin besides fact luggage stolen street ok maybe seemed little tourist even business traveler location residential part town room pull metal chains window choose keep closed avoid view neighbors laundry rack oh bars come handy hotel safe however extreme valuables cant risk store checkin counter mere 10 euros enjoy working avoid actually put empty room workout facility decided mini bar would world nothing mediocre pizza place street option however advised us shop across street could buy everything special cereal fake ipod decided save breakfast quite made breakfast street noise unbearable

Reviews.Title: “Good amenities, not ideal location”
Reviews.Author: TravelingAuntA
Reviews.Content: hotel somehow connected marriott chain better known ac hotel taxi driver airport hotel located small side street airport town center close metro station came late evening road quiet however morning traffic room liked much wood marble view directly street area mostly residential number bars restaurants breakfast limited selection fruit cheeses ham good quality staff friendly process efficient

Reviews.Title: “Very nice. Clean and modern.”
Reviews.Author: roscoe_love
Reviews.Content: plan stay business week items already bother overall rooms modern clean happen disagree comment complaining bc staff speak english travel every months spain several occasions hotel one worst experiences trying communicate basic ordering room services asking towels experience nice also staying another hotel return business

Reviews.Title: “Very modern, clean and comfortable rooms.”
Reviews.Author: SamGorchuk
Reviews.Content: modern clean near metro staff good breakfast

Reviews.Title: “bad value to money”
Reviews.Author: eugeita
Reviews.Content: currently staying ac business 5 days main desk afternoons best made stay far friendliest professional staff encountered since first day gracious providing us outstanding directions many madrids tourist sites rooms pleasant sure street side get noisy rooms clean beds comfortable hear lot banging doors open closed hard bring ear plugs light sleeper lounge free internet serves reasonably priced food chicken good choice food served even local restaurants closed metro 10 minute walk metro safe use traveling alone husband business people spain friendly dont expect much help streets stores research ahead time dont stand tourist

Reviews.Title: “awesome stay, clean&cheap”
Reviews.Author: Soniadory
Reviews.Content: stayed four days ac hotel avenida de america february 2012 arrived car place park drop bags called see rates parking garage didnt wanted place park drop bags clerk checked us phone whole time spoke us seemed busy greet us also luggage several bags one elevator order two four days stayed standard room fifth floor walls paper thin busy noisy street made difficult get sleep room service prompt morning coffee reasonably priced dinner one night restaurant good overpriced service prompt internet free lounge area wireless room 12 euros 24 hours location close avenida de america station shops restaurants within walking distance price room reasonable go back madrid ill probably find another hotel centrally located

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: RuiCapucho
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel two nights new years eve great rate superior room really enjoyed room seperate seating area two tvs one bed one sofa room clean hotel quiet dont think many guests staying didnt food hotel location ok dont mind walks seeking central location would first choice

Reviews.Title: “Free mini bar, comfortable rooms”
Reviews.Author: S_von_Linde
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel multiple times like best size room rate center metro 5 min away cant beat rooms also clean comfortable many restaurants nearby take short metro ride center lots options staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “Quite a Little Gem”
Reviews.Author: Dianha
Reviews.Content: many far superior hotels choose category come ac marriott property terribly disappointed checkin checkout even worse two guys front desk phone seemed assisting us ever line mind might miss flight euro breakfast biggest disappointment joke ive seen years travel buffet consisted cold bread cheese limited selection fruit cold cereal one small piece hot tea euro please worth perhaps 1 room considerably smaller one even though id booked type room window overlooked back building complete laundry hanging windows across street ill back madrid week booked another property

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel, Extremely Friendly Staff, Very Clean Rooms!”
Reviews.Author: dollsandlace
Reviews.Content: stayed month dec jan like second home staff friendly rooms really nice close metro station walking 5 mins free internet offered coffee shop quite good always available rooms quite spacious cozy back would love stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Amazing rooms”
Reviews.Author: IngTL
Reviews.Content: stayed may 2011 turned hotel originally booked middle plaza de la puerta del sol felt important quiet night especially beginning trip hotel clean modern nice amenities including free minibar soft drinks replenished daily fix also beds incredibly comfortable staff friendly helpful came place switching marriott heard also got excellent price even last minute location ok certainly especially comfortable public transportation andor willing pay taxi probably took minutes get hotel prado example took metro mostly although one night took cab reasonable split four ways eat breakfast seemed pretty expensive didnt spend much time neighborhood certainly safe trouble picking place eat probably spoke better spanish known coming advance food situation would fine overall might go back incredible deal would probably try stay closer downtown possible

Reviews.Title: “The nicest hotel we stayed at!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kagome999
Reviews.Content: really enjoyed hotel far downtown madrid ten minutes train station breakfast extra pricey free internet good

Reviews.Title: “Excellent price for top quality standards”
Reviews.Author: AnaZurich
Reviews.Content: hotel good ugly neighbourhood distant city wi fi room lobby tip flying america aware next mornings might miss breakfast isnt nice place nearby go

Reviews.Title: “A nice hotel, but not centrally located.”
Reviews.Author: TrektheWorld
Reviews.Content: nice comfortable hotel boyfriend long weekend perfect needs hotel centre town really close metro takes 510 mins get sol opera royal palace located easily walk town first day walk people madrid shop eat hotel full tourists neither surroundings costs 18 euros cab airport finish town late costs 10 euros back hotel cheap eyes didnt breakfast hotel generally hotel breakfasts expensive give went cafe around corner ideal good trip hotel fine free mini bar soft drinks restocked every day thing would change would free wifi room perfect

Reviews.Title: “Clean and modern!”
Reviews.Author: roby73
Reviews.Content: fantastic stay ac avenida de friend offer called romantic february brought room bottle champagne chocolates room awesome big superior room quiet pillows slippers bathrobe plus booked little advance fashion week cheap compared hotels

Reviews.Title: “Truely worth it”
Reviews.Author: bari_ttc
Reviews.Content: good location nice staff wifi could free charge rooms lobby

Reviews.Title: “Worst Reception Ever”
Reviews.Author: feliz79
Reviews.Content: best aspect offer everything mini bar free rooms modern others need refurbishment request newer room rooms clean staff helpful location hotel good metro station 2 minutes away hotel luxury hotel good place stay madrid reasonable price book also madrid everywhere spain much cheaper interesting breakfast one typical

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, terrible reception”
Reviews.Author: HellCat74
Reviews.Content: booked reservation ac avenida reading hotel one trip best email needed something close downtown madrid without costing arm two legs say wasnt disappointed selection first good rooms modern art deco look feel complete hardwood floors minimal furniture sinks low lighting green marble tile bathroom wood sliding doors frosted glass make closets light beautiful ive ever seen hotel food isnt bad much cheaper options right area want eat hotel sure confirm menu front desk offerings change depending time day im sure due fact august entire city pretty much holiday rather housekeeping staff fantastic job cleaning rooms one particular room looking like id never stepped foot bad dont many complaints ac three things bother 1 clock room spain thing 2 fitness center actually two weight rack 3 charging 12 euros wifi room although free lobby bit ridiculous thats take ac avenida pleasant stay would recommend like bare essentials little oh dont speak spanish desperate need help ask front desk

Reviews.Title: “Free minibar in great hotel”
Reviews.Author: coxjon
Reviews.Content: stayed madrid hotel may loved hotel lovely absolutely clean really appreciated cold drinks mini fridge evening returned day trips staff helpful well well steps metro station loved pub across street stay great

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel located near the Metro”
Reviews.Author: wylie31
Reviews.Content: really great value really nice rooms room spacious clean comfortable safe quiet luxurious lots business people staying hotel posh great meeting fellow travellers staff didnt speak much english didnt speak much spanish communication little difficult impossible hotel city centre close 2 metro stations main bus terminal airport buses pick

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased in every way”
Reviews.Author: topps61
Reviews.Content: friend travelling europe weeks last stop stayed hotel 4 nights nice surprise used staying hostels budget hotels booked hotel based reviews tripadvisor also low price got room dropped nice room students traveling fairly tight budget pleased stay would recommend anyone visiting madrid location hotel city centre metro system convenient distance isnt problem metro station 2 minutes might take minutes youre else either distance 5 minute ride away pretty close 20 minute bus ride area around hotel safe restaurants rooms clean comfortable modern rooms free first one ive come across lcd tv problems noise thing bit disappointed teh staff didnt seem friendly werent helpful answering questions nevertheless pleasant comfortable stay would highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Loved it, Tripadvisor scores again”
Reviews.Author: ultrak3wl
Reviews.Content: quite modern hotel well located rooms confortable sort services available friendly helpfull staff good value money bed really confortable problem wasnt working room lots light coming morning

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: Dunn
Reviews.Content: hotel nice clean wasnt located particular area could walk different metro stops wanted travel around city offered free internet bar area rooms spacious would recommend friend looking safe clean hotel crash feel might better hotels located areas closer hip spots

Reviews.Title: “Amazing stay at the AC Avda de America hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: expectations high based reviews many sites disappointed free minibar great along clean comfortable rooms rooms much larger view side much smaller street view room large windows nice size closet great bathroom good lighting throughout location quiet interesting residential neighborhood close 2 metro stations made nice short walks local stores bars destinations taxis center city 10 euros tip call front desk fix exterior window shade fixed within 15 husbands fast speak spanish able communicate staff including breakfast helpful polite everyone one left wallet cash lobby chair returned held front desk returned lastly arrived 9am given room immediately made difference extra day city without wear travel clothes
